prompts.title: Explain Quantum Computing Concepts
prompts.content: Write a detailed explanation about {quantum_concept} suitable for an audience with {audience_knowledge_level}. Include examples of {real_world_applications} and explain the implications for {industry}.
prompts.description: Generates an informative piece explaining quantum computing concepts.

variables.name: audience_knowledge_level
variables.description: The level of knowledge the audience has.

prompts.title: Develop a Software Requirements Specification
prompts.content: Create a detailed software requirements specification for a {software_type} application that performs {key_functions}. The specification should include {user_stories}, {functional_requirements}, and {non_functional_requirements}.
prompts.description: Produces a comprehensive software requirements document.

variables.name: key_functions
variables.description: Core functions the software should perform.

variables.name: user_stories
variables.example: As a user, I want to check my balance

variables.name: functional_requirements
variables.description: Specific functions the software must have.

variables.name: non_functional_requirements
variables.description: System attributes like security and performance.
variables.example: data encryption, response time under 2 seconds

prompts.title: Write a Technology Trend Analysis Report
prompts.content: Compose a report analyzing the current trends in {technology_field}. Include data on {market_growth}, discuss {emerging_technologies}, and predict {future_impacts} on {related_industries}.
prompts.description: Generates a professional report on technology trends.

variables.name: market_growth
variables.description: Data on market size and growth.
variables.example: AI market expected to reach $190 billion by 2025

prompts.title: Design a Network Architecture Diagram
prompts.content: Create a network architecture diagram for a {organization_type} that requires {network_requirements}. Include components like {hardware_devices}, {security_measures}, and plan for {scalability_options}.
prompts.description: Produces a visual representation of a network setup.

prompts.title: Compose a Cybersecurity Incident Response Plan
prompts.content: Develop a comprehensive incident response plan for handling {cybersecurity_threats}. Outline steps for {detection_methods}, {containment_procedures}, and {recovery_processes}. Include roles for {team_members}.
prompts.description: Creates a plan to respond to cybersecurity incidents.

prompts.title: Draft an API Documentation
prompts.content: Write detailed documentation for the {api_name} API that allows developers to {api_functionality}. Include sections on {endpoints}, {authentication_methods}, and provide {code_examples} in {programming_languages}.
prompts.description: Generates developer-friendly API documentation.

variables.name: api_functionality
variables.description: What the API enables developers to do.

variables.name: code_examples
variables.example: GET requests in Python and JavaScript

prompts.title: Create a User Manual for a Tech Product
prompts.content: Develop a user manual for the {product_name}, covering {setup_instructions}, {feature_explanations}, and {troubleshooting_tips}. Use clear language suitable for {target_audience}.
prompts.description: Produces a comprehensive user guide for a technology product.

variables.name: setup_instructions
variables.description: Guidelines to set up the product.

prompts.title: Outline a Machine Learning Project Proposal
prompts.content: Prepare a project proposal for developing a machine learning model to {solve_problem}. Include objectives like {performance_metrics}, discuss {data_requirements}, and outline {methodologies} to be used.
prompts.description: Creates a proposal for a machine learning initiative.

variables.name: solve_problem
variables.description: Problem the ML model aims to solve.

prompts.title: Design a Mobile App Wireframe
prompts.content: Create a wireframe for a mobile app that offers {app_services}. The design should focus on {user_experience_features} and be optimized for {platforms}. Include screens for {key_pages}.
prompts.description: Generates a blueprint for a mobile application interface.

variables.name: key_pages
variables.example: home page, menu, cart, order tracking

prompts.title: Write a Technical Blog Post
prompts.content: Compose a blog post about {technical_topic} that explains {key_concepts} and provides {practical_examples}. Target the content towards {reader_skill_level} developers.
prompts.description: Produces an educational blog post on a technical subject.

variables.name: practical_examples
variables.example: building a Dockerfile for a Node.js app

variables.name: reader_skill_level
variables.description: Skill level of the target audience.

prompts.title: Develop a Test Plan for Software Application
prompts.content: Create a detailed test plan for a {software_type} application focusing on {testing_types}. Include test cases for {core_features} and specify {testing_tools} to be used.
prompts.description: Generates a comprehensive software testing strategy.

variables.name: testing_types
variables.example: unit testing, integration testing, performance testing

prompts.title: Compose an Email Migration Plan
prompts.content: Draft a plan to migrate email services from {current_provider} to {new_provider}. Address {migration_steps}, potential {risks}, and include a {rollback_strategy}.
prompts.description: Creates a structured approach for migrating email services.

variables.name: migration_steps
variables.description: Sequential steps to perform the migration.
variables.example: data backup, DNS configuration, user training

variables.name: rollback_strategy
variables.description: Plan to revert changes if needed.
variables.example: maintain backups, switch back DNS settings

prompts.title: Design an IoT System Architecture
prompts.content: Create an architectural plan for an IoT system that monitors {environmental_parameters}. Include components like {sensors}, {communication_protocols}, and {data_processing_methods}.
prompts.description: Outlines the structure of an Internet of Things system.

variables.name: data_processing_methods
variables.description: How data will be processed and analyzed.

prompts.title: Write a White Paper on Emerging Technology
prompts.content: Compose a white paper discussing the potential of {emerging_technology} in transforming {industry_sector}. Include analysis of {benefits}, {challenges}, and {case_studies}.
prompts.description: Generates an authoritative report on new technology applications.

variables.name: case_studies
variables.example: companies implementing blockchain for tracking goods

prompts.title: Create a Data Backup and Recovery Plan
prompts.content: Develop a plan for backing up and recovering data for a {business_size} organization. Specify {backup_methods}, {storage_solutions}, and outline {recovery_procedures}.
prompts.description: Provides a strategy for data protection and recovery.

prompts.title: Draft a Proposal for IT Infrastructure Upgrade
prompts.content: Prepare a proposal to upgrade the IT infrastructure of a {company_type}. Address needs like {performance_improvements}, {security_enhancements}, and provide a {budget_estimate}.
prompts.description: Creates a formal proposal for improving IT systems.

variables.name: performance_improvements
variables.description: Areas where performance can be enhanced.

prompts.title: Compose a Code Review Checklist
prompts.content: Create a checklist for reviewing code in {programming_language}. Include items related to {code_quality}, {security}, and {performance}. Tailor it for {development_team_size}.
prompts.description: Provides guidelines for conducting thorough code reviews.

variables.name: security
variables.example: input validation, protection against injection attacks

variables.name: development_team_size
variables.description: Size of the team using the checklist.

prompts.title: Design a Cloud Migration Strategy
prompts.content: Outline a strategy to migrate on-premises infrastructure to the {cloud_provider} cloud platform. Address {migration_phases}, {cost_estimations}, and include plans for {training_staff}.
prompts.description: Creates a plan for moving services to the cloud.

variables.name: cost_estimations
variables.example: initial setup costs, ongoing operational costs

prompts.title: Write a Tech Product Review
prompts.content: Compose a comprehensive review of the {product_name}, focusing on {features}, {performance}, and {user_experience}. Provide comparisons with {competitor_products} and include a {recommendation}.
prompts.description: Generates an in-depth review of a technology product.

variables.name: product_name
variables.description: Name of the product being reviewed.

variables.name: performance
variables.description: Assessment of how well the product works.

variables.name: user_experience
variables.description: Ease of use and interface design.

prompts.title: Develop a Virtual Reality Application Proposal
prompts.content: Prepare a proposal for creating a virtual reality application aimed at {target_audience}. The app will feature {key_elements} and will be used for {application_purpose}.
prompts.description: Creates a plan for developing a VR application.

variables.name: application_purpose
variables.description: The primary use of the app.

prompts.title: Compose an Ethical Hacking Tutorial
prompts.content: Write a step-by-step tutorial on how to perform {ethical_hacking_technique} using {tools}. Emphasize {legal_considerations} and best practices for {security_improvement}.
prompts.description: Provides educational content on ethical hacking methods.

variables.name: legal_considerations
variables.description: Laws and ethics to be aware of.

variables.name: security_improvement
variables.description: How the technique aids in security.

prompts.title: Draft a Patent Application for a Tech Invention
prompts.content: Prepare a patent application for an invention that {invention_description}. Include detailed {technical_drawings}, explain the {novel_features}, and outline the {potential_applications}.
prompts.description: Creates the documentation needed for a tech patent application.

variables.name: invention_description
variables.example: a new type of energy-efficient battery

variables.name: novel_features
variables.description: Unique aspects that make it patentable.

variables.name: potential_applications
variables.description: Ways the invention can be used.

prompts.title: Create a Technical Presentation Slide Deck
prompts.content: Design a slide deck for a presentation on {technical_topic}. Include slides on {introduction}, {main_points}, {data_visualizations}, and conclude with {call_to_action}.
prompts.description: Produces a professional presentation on a technical subject.

variables.name: call_to_action
variables.description: What you want the audience to do next.

prompts.title: Develop a Robotics Project Plan
prompts.content: Outline a project plan for building a robot that can {robot_functionality}. Detail the required {hardware_components}, {software_algorithms}, and set milestones for {development_phases}.
prompts.description: Creates a roadmap for a robotics project.

variables.name: robot_functionality
variables.description: What the robot is designed to do.

prompts.title: Compose a Data Privacy Policy
prompts.content: Write a data privacy policy for a {type_of_website} that collects {types_of_data}. Include information on {data_usage}, {user_rights}, and comply with {regulatory_requirements}.
prompts.description: Generates a policy document outlining data privacy practices.

variables.name: data_usage
variables.description: How the data will be used.

prompts.title: Design a Blockchain-based Application
prompts.content: Outline a plan to develop a blockchain application for {use_case}. Specify the {blockchain_platform}, define {smart_contracts}, and discuss {security_measures}.
prompts.description: Creates a development plan for a blockchain application.

prompts.title: Compose Guidelines for Remote Work Technology
prompts.content: Write a set of guidelines for employees on using {remote_work_tools}. Include best practices for {communication}, {security}, and {productivity}.
prompts.description: Provides instructions to optimize remote work technology usage.

prompts.title: Create a Proposal for an AI Chatbot
prompts.content: Draft a proposal to develop an AI chatbot for {business_purpose}. Outline its {features}, discuss the {technologies_used}, and provide a {development_timeline}.
prompts.description: Generates a plan for creating an AI chatbot.

variables.name: business_purpose
variables.description: The main function of the chatbot.

prompts.title: Draft a Cybersecurity Awareness Training
prompts.content: Prepare training materials on cybersecurity awareness covering topics like {threat_types}, {best_practices}, and {incident_reporting}. Tailor it for {employee_level}.
prompts.description: Creates content for educating employees on cybersecurity.

variables.name: threat_types
variables.description: Types of cyber threats to cover.

prompts.title: Compose a Proposal for Renewable Energy Technology
prompts.content: Write a proposal to implement {renewable_energy_solution} in {location}. Include {cost_analysis}, {environmental_benefits}, and a plan for {community_engagement}.
prompts.description: Generates a plan to adopt renewable energy technologies.

variables.name: location
variables.description: Where the solution will be implemented.

variables.name: community_engagement
variables.description: How the community will be involved.

prompts.title: Create a User Interface Design Guideline
prompts.content: Develop a set of UI design guidelines for {application_type}, focusing on {usability_principles}, {accessibility_standards}, and {branding_elements}.
prompts.description: Provides standards for designing user interfaces.

variables.name: accessibility_standards
variables.description: Standards to make the app accessible.

prompts.title: Draft a Proposal for Implementing 3D Printing
prompts.content: Write a proposal to integrate 3D printing technology into {manufacturing_process}. Discuss {benefits}, required {equipment}, and {training} for staff.
prompts.description: Creates a plan for adopting 3D printing in manufacturing.

variables.name: manufacturing_process
variables.description: The process to enhance with 3D printing.

prompts.title: Compose an Article on Ethical AI
prompts.content: Write an article exploring the ethical considerations of {AI_application}. Discuss issues like {bias}, {transparency}, and suggest {best_practices}.
prompts.description: Generates a thought-provoking piece on AI ethics.

prompts.title: Create a Proposal for Smart City Technology
prompts.content: Draft a proposal to implement smart city solutions in {city_name}. Focus on {technology_areas}, provide {budget_estimates}, and outline {implementation_timeline}.
prompts.description: Plans the integration of technology into urban infrastructure.

prompts.title: Design an Augmented Reality Experience
prompts.content: Plan an augmented reality application for {industry_use}. Include {interactive_elements}, specify the {hardware_requirements}, and discuss {user_engagement_strategies}.
prompts.description: Creates a blueprint for an AR application.

variables.name: industry_use
variables.description: How the AR app will be used.

variables.name: interactive_elements
variables.description: Features that users can interact with.

variables.name: hardware_requirements
variables.description: Devices needed to run the app.

prompts.title: Compose Guidelines for Data Visualization
prompts.content: Develop guidelines for creating effective data visualizations for {data_type}. Emphasize {visual_best_practices}, recommend {tools}, and consider {audience_needs}.
prompts.description: Provides standards for visualizing data effectively.

variables.name: audience_needs
variables.description: Considerations based on who will view the data.
variables.example: executive summaries, detailed analysis for analysts

prompts.title: Draft a Proposal for AI in Healthcare
prompts.content: Write a proposal to implement AI solutions in {healthcare_setting}. Discuss {benefits}, potential {ethical_concerns}, and outline {implementation_steps}.
prompts.description: Creates a plan for integrating AI into healthcare.

prompts.title: Create a Disaster Recovery Plan for IT Systems
prompts.content: Develop a disaster recovery plan for {organization_type} focusing on {critical_systems}. Include {risk_assessment}, {recovery_strategies}, and {communication_plan}.
prompts.description: Prepares an organization for IT disasters.

prompts.title: Compose an Article on 5G Technology Impact
prompts.content: Write an article discussing the impact of 5G technology on {industry_sector}. Cover {opportunities}, {challenges}, and future {predictions}.
prompts.description: Explores how 5G will transform industries.

variables.name: predictions
variables.example: mass adoption of connected cars by 2030

prompts.title: Design a Voice User Interface (VUI)
prompts.content: Create a design plan for a voice user interface for {application_type}. Define {user_commands}, outline {response_behaviors}, and ensure compliance with {accessibility_guidelines}.
prompts.description: Plans the development of a voice-controlled interface.

variables.name: user_commands
variables.example: "Turn on the lights", "Set thermostat to 70 degrees"

variables.name: accessibility_guidelines
variables.description: Standards to make the VUI accessible.
variables.example: support for multiple languages, speech recognition accuracy

prompts.title: Compose a Report on Cloud Security Best Practices
prompts.content: Write a report detailing best practices for securing cloud environments in {industry}. Cover areas like {data_protection}, {access_control}, and {compliance}.
prompts.description: Provides guidance on maintaining security in the cloud.

prompts.title: Develop a Plan for Implementing Edge Computing
prompts.content: Outline a strategy to integrate edge computing into {business_operations}. Discuss {use_cases}, required {infrastructure}, and {potential_benefits}.
prompts.description: Creates a plan for adopting edge computing technology.

prompts.title: Compose Guidelines for BYOD (Bring Your Own Device)
prompts.content: Develop guidelines for employees who use personal devices for work. Address {security_policies}, {acceptable_use}, and {support_procedures}.
prompts.description: Provides a policy framework for BYOD practices.

variables.name: acceptable_use
variables.description: What is permissible on personal devices.

variables.name: support_procedures
variables.description: How IT support will be provided.
